isApplicable

public boolean isApplicable()
Description copied from interface: MeltingComputationMethod
This method is called to check that the options entered by the users are applicable with the used model (class).

Specified by:
isApplicable in interface MeltingComputationMethod
Returns:
false if at least one chosen option makes the model completely false. If one chosen option may lead to less reliable results, a warning message will appear. (ex : wrong hybridization type)
